content: elena s hat materials needed 1 skein worsted weight yarn i used vanna s choice-3 5 ounce/170 yards in rose 1 skein bernat boa or any novelty yarn -5 grams-70 yards pictures of another hat tested by naomi of http //ofswiftsandnotsoswift blogspot com/ will be at the end of this pattern she used red heart super saver joann bedazzle yarn which is a ribbon type ladder yarn and just switched to the l hook for the one row for the brim and then back to the k hook for the smaller hat **the sizing notations are noted after round 31 to make the hat longer over the ears just continue in even rounds after row 30 before beginning the rim notions k hook 6 5 mm l hook 8 0 mm tapestry needle stitch marker this hat is done in the round no seams or joining on increase rounds 1-12 the 2 single_crochet increase will be at the stitch marker-if it isn t your count is off stitches used slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet gauge 7 single_crochet = 2 using k hook 6 5 mm instructions chain 4 and slip_stitch to first chain to form ring round 1-work 6 single_crochet into ring round 2-2 single_crochet into each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet and place stitch marker in last single_crochet round 3-1 single_crochet in first single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next around ending with 2 single_crochet in stitch where stitch marker is- place marker in this last stitch and the last stitch for each round hereafter round 4 1 single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 5 1 single_crochet in first 3 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 6- 1 single_crochet in first 4 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 7- 1 single_crochet in first 5 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 8-1 single_crochet in first 6 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 9-1 single_crochet in first 7 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 10-1 single_crochet in first 8 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 11-1 single_crochet in first 9 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around round 12-1 single_crochet in first 10 single_crochet and 2 single_crochet in next repeat around the hat should measure 6 across here round 13-30-single_crochet crochet around evenly and move marker up for each round round 31-this forms the fold-switch to l hook 8mm and turn work single_crochet in each st around until first single_crochet don t stitch here yet join novelty yarn with ww yarn here and join to first single_crochet with slip_stitch and turn again place marker here **from here on out work in rounds holding both boa and worsted yarn together using the l hook for an adult hat or child who has a lot of hair measured 7 in diameter or switch back to the k hook for a small head or younger child 6 in diameter rounds
